name: The End of The Covid-19
description:
This game is for my school assignment.

The lecturer ask our class to make a game about covid-19 individually.

So, here is the result.

Storyline :

The Covid-19 monsters suddenly attack the kingdom. The king send a knight to the defend the fort from Covid-19 monsters. The knight known as Rectangle. Can Retangle defeat all the Covid-19 monsters and save the kingdom?

Control :

A - Move left

D - Move right

W - Jump

Space - Attack

Objectives :

- Survive and defeat all the Covid-19 monsters (total 50) to get 3 Stars.

- Survive and defeat 36-49 Covid-19 monsters to get 2 Stars.

- Survive and defeat 25-35 Covid-19 monsters to get 1 Star.
